mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ravenscroft, John Stark, 1772-1830
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Supplies much information, in answer to Jefferson's request of 3rd, about domestic spinning machinery; doubtful of Jefferson's twelve-spindle machine; Jefferson's neighbours, Tucker Coles and wife, have seen his and can inform him concerning it.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1812 July 21, Lunenberg County, Virginia to Thomas Jefferson, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia].
